item.description:
Event: Enjoy beautiful music, a lovely venue, delectable desserts, champagne, & the company of a friendly and a gender-balanced group of congenial singles. The Boston Jewish Music Festival has kindly set aside a section for singles at Basya Schechter’s concert, “Songs of Wonder.” Following the concert, join us for a singles’ dessert and champagne reception. This is a gender-balanced evening, thus *only those who have preregisterd at www.bresler.us will be admitted to the special singles section and reception.*   PLEASE NOTE:  Registration here on Meetup will NOT hold your spot.

Meet:  Congregation Kehillath Israel in Brookline at 384 Harvard St.,02446 at 7:30p.m.The TC will be at a table in the lobby of the temple, wearing a name tag and a flower.

Doors open at 7:30 p.m. and the concert begins at 8. The dessert and champagne reception will be held from 9:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m.

 

Trip's Leader: Elana

Meet:  Congregation Kehillath Israel in Brookline at 384 Harvard St.,02446 at 7:30p.m.The TC will be at a table in the lobby of the temple, wearing a name tag and a flower.

R.S.V.P:  You must pre-register for the event at www.bresler.us but send an rsvp here as well so we all know who is coming.

Cost:$20 for concert tickets, and $12 for the champagne/dessert reception.
item.how_to_find_us: Elana will be at a table in the lobby of the temple, wearing a name tag and a flower.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Boston Jewish Music Fest- CONCERT & RECEPTION for JEWISH SINGLES 45 - 65
